title: Pluralsight - Beginning HTML5 Game Development With Quintus
description: Game development is awesome! And it is actually much easier than you think, especially now that you can develop games completely using web technologies you probably are already familiar with. Modern browsers today that have support for HTML5 and fast JavaScript engines are more than capable of running complex games that would have been impossible years earlier. Then, weÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll dive right in and start implementing the basics of a game. WeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll start off by actually creating the start of a game completely from scratch, implementing everything ourselves. Once weÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve seen the basics of doing things from scratch, weÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll introduce a JavaScript game engine to help us out as we learn about Quintus and start building our first real complete game. From there on weÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll expand our game little by little as we add features like moving a player around and firing shots in the game. WeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll also learn how to create enemies in the game and give them some intelligence. So, if you are interested in game development or if you just want to see what is possible with HTML5, check out this course. YouÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll be surprised how easily you can put together a real HTML5 game.
